result.text: MENTOR, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY), a leading global materials science and digital identification solutions company, today announced it will host its third quarter 2025 earnings conference call at 11:00 a.m. ET on Wednesday, October 22, 2025. The company's third quarter earnings release will be issued that morning at approximately 6:45 a.m. ET.
